name: Harbinger (itch) (Kevin Ray)
description:
WASD to move.

Left click to shoot.

Right click to grapple.

Space to jump.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam. The theme was Dimension Switch where we had to take a mechanic from a 2D game and turn it into a 3D game or vice versa. I took the "hit and enemy to refresh your jump" mechanic from The Messenger and turned it into a Doom-like platform shooter. Shooting green objects (other than projectiles) refreshes your jump. Getting hit by an enemy will disable your gun for a couple seconds. Have fun!
